chapter.subtitle: Drupal installation tasks related to the Forena module
chapter.abstract: Drupal related tasks to install the Forena module.

chapter.title: Granting Permissions
chapter.subtitle: Grant various levels of access specific to reports and charts
chapter.abstract: Learn what permissions forena advertizes and their meaning.

chapter.title: Enable SVGGraph
chapter.subtitle: SVGGraph Library Installation
chapter.abstract: Install the PHP SVG Graph library to create all sorts of graphs (charts), such as piecharts, barcharts, radarcharts, etc.

chapter.title: Enable DataTables
chapter.subtitle: DataTables Library Installation
chapter.abstract: Install the DataTables library to use the dataTables JQuery plugin, which adds all sorts of interesting features to display (render) an HTML table, such as presenting paged tables (pagination), filtering of rows, etc.

chapter.title: Upgrading from Prior Versions
chapter.subtitle: Special considerations for upgrading from prior software versions
chapter.abstract: After upgrading from a previous software version, some special modifications may be required for custom reports that were created in a prior release
